name: Pamplemousse
description:
Little Project made by 4 Friends in 2 days to learn C++ Basics ;

Installation :

// We screw up so .exe don't work :)

Unzip the file ;

Open pamplePerso.sln with a C++ compatible Integrated development environment like VisualStudio or  CodeBlocks ;

Play the projet (with Debug) ;

Enjoy :

// You can also create your own Levels !

Go to pamplePerso v3\pamplePerso ;

Edit level_1 to level_8 to create your own run ;

// level_1 is the menu and level_9 is the end screen

// There is a Level Template please take his proportion

// S = Spawn of Player

// + = Exit

// X  = Ground (Walkable)

// # = Wall

// Blank = Void (Dead if you Fall)
